cab.content: 13IB DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OP HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVERNMENT)S E C R B T"CP. (k5) 153(Also. M. O.C. (1+5) 1 )6TH SEPTEMBER, 1 9L5 COPY NO. t /cabinet ministerial OIL COMMITTEEMEdBERSHIP AND TERMS OP REFERENCE 'Note by the Secretary of the CabinetThe Prime Minister has reconstituted the ministerial committee on Oil with the following membership:-The Lord President of the Council (Chairman)The Minister of Fuel and power the Eirst Lord of the admiralty the Minister of Aar transport the Minister of State *The Financial Secretary to the treasury the Parliamentary Secretary, Board of Trade(Mr. Marquand)The Parliamentary Under Secretary of State forIndia and for Burma.The terms of reference of the Committee are:-"To consider and advise the Cabinet as maybe necessary on such questions of oilpolicy as may from time to time bereferred to it. "- The Secretaries will be:-Sir Gilbert Laithwaite, Cabinet office mr. K.L. Stock, Ministry of Fuel and Power.(Signed) E.E. BRIDGESCabinet Office, S.W.1.,6th September, 192+5.
